document_data.name: ''Armor of Resistance''
document_data.value4e: {{Split table|rca=right|Lvl 2|520 [[gp]]|Lvl 7|2,600 gp|Lvl 12|13,000 gp|Lvl 17|65,000 gp|Lvl 22|325,000 gp|Lvl 27|1,625,000 gp}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Armor of resistance''''' was an enchanted suit of [[armor]] that offered protection against a particular type of [[magic]]al energy.
document_data.Description: Any suit of armor could be enchanted to gain the properties of an ''armor of resistance''.
document_data.Powers: A creature attuned to the ''armor of resistance'' enjoyed considerable protection from one particular type of energy or substance while wearing the full suit, roughly reducing any damage taken of the specified type by half. Most common variants offered protection against [[acid]], cold, [[fire]], [[force]], lightning, [[negative energy]], [[poison]], [[positive energy]], psychic energy, or sonic energy.
